gameDetails.name: Wasteland Express Delivery Service: Promo Pack 1
gameDetails.description:
A pack of 11 cards given out when the base game was pre-ordered or purchased at GenCon 2017, containing the following cards:

Events: 
Warp Speed, Aftershock, Loaded to the Hilt, The Summit, The Raid

Allies: Rocker, The Zealot

Oracle of Ceres: Off Our Hands

New Republic Army: Endless War

The Archivists: Escape Hatch

Priority First-Class Contracts: The Fall (Standalone contract)
